post.body:
There are two main ways people try to get around this fact. One group of people says that you create your own luck, your own destiny, etc., you choose to be happy or unhappy, everything is by perseverance, genes don't mean anything, etc. Basically they insist that the world is fair and the choice is yours. The other group acknowledges that we are unfairly divided by biology, external circumstances, etc. but they somehow manage to glorify it, saying that is how it *should* be. The first position is a lie. The second one is evil.

This is obviously mental gymnastics to stop us from admitting the truth. Yes, people have almost no say in their lives and nearly everything is determined for them, and no, it's not a good thing. And no, there's nothing we can do about it. It's the truth, and we're not getting anywhere by trying to get around it. You get what you are handed, and that's the end of it. It's the red/black pill.

Edit: seeing as my post was yanked to +IncelTears, no this isn't an incel problem. I mean incel problems are one thing this encompasses, but I'm not an incel nor was it the point of this post.

post.body:
There are two main ways people try to get around this fact. One group of people says that you create your own luck, your own destiny, etc., you choose to be happy or unhappy, everything is by perseverance, genes don't mean anything, etc. Basically they insist that the world is fair and the choice is yours. The other group acknowledges that we are unfairly divided by biology, external circumstances, etc. but they somehow manage to glorify it, saying that is how it *should* be. The first position is a lie. The second one is evil.

This is obviously mental gymnastics to stop us from admitting the truth. Yes, people have almost no say in their lives and nearly everything is determined for them, and no, it's not a good thing. And no, there's nothing we can do about it. It's the truth, and we're not getting anywhere by trying to get around it. You get what you are handed, and that's the end of it. It's the red/black pill.

Edit: seeing as my post was yanked to +IncelTears, no this isn't an incel problem. I mean incel problems are one thing this encompasses, but I'm not an incel nor was it the point of this post.

guild.description:
"For God so loved the world, that He gave His only begotten Son, that whoever believes in Him shall not perish, but have eternal life. For God did not send the Son into the world to judge the world, but that the world might be saved through Him. He who believes in Him is not judged; he who does not believe has been judged already, because he has not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God. This is the judgment, that the Light has come into the world, and men loved the darkness rather than the Light, for their deeds were evil. For everyone who does evil hates the Light, and does not come to the Light for fear that his deeds will be exposed. But he who practices the truth comes to the Light, so that his deeds may be manifested as having been wrought in God."

May all personally encounter the presence and attention of the Lord God. 

Curiosity, questions, discussion, and prayer requests are welcome.
